definitions.definition: of, relating to, or characteristic of people or human beings.
of or characteristic of people as opposed to God or animals or machines, especially in being susceptible to weaknesses.
examples: they are only human, and therefore mistakes do occur

definitions.definition: of or characteristic of people's better qualities, such as kindness or sensitivity.
examples: the human side of politics is getting stronger

definitions.definition: of or belonging to the genus Homo.
a human being, especially a person as distinguished from an animal or (in science fiction) an alien.
examples: person, human being, personage, mortal, member of the human race; Moreman, woman; individual, soul, living soul, being; Homo sapiens; earthling "the link between humans and animals"Moreman, woman; individual, soul, living soul, being; Homo sapiens; earthling the link between humans and animals
